message.body: NFL Opener, this weekend coming up, big book for me publishes today
oh so the books goes on sale today?
how was the weekend? did you go camping?
stayed home to get some crap done
been out of town the last few weekends so needed to catch up on everything
what you doing in the baby's room?
I got a round in yesterday
shot a 103...but it was really 5 holes that f'd me
really tight fairways, and everything is sloped
well...it was $85 -- but once I get my Westchester County Card...it will be $55
the other thing that sucked...they aerated the greens...so they were bumpy as shit
and you didn't get a discount?
they should offer discounted fees if they aerate - and you should have had a two put max
the guy I played with was a total doosh
almost drove off with me half in the cart
and I had enough so I yelled at him
then with no warning...he takes his bag off the cart and walks off at the 16th tee
just says "I'm going to call it a day"
then he gives himself a 10-foot putt for "birdie"
sweet, I want to use his rule book when we play
the other two guys I played with were openly making fun of him
and the other guy threw his club...like threw it at least 4 times
it was a really weird round
but I will play the course again...have to be so precise
miss anywhere and you are totally screwed
yeah we haven't played too many of those this year
might have a drizzle-filled round on Saturday
is it supposed to be crappy?
we can play in a light drizzle too
yeah I have no problem with that
played a lot of those growing up
so -- when Crist got pulled, I said "Crist just got Kolb'd"
you think Rees will start the rest of the way?
ps -- your offense should be "throw to Michael Floyd"
on the Crist INT...he was wide opening on his slant or whatever
I think Crist and Reese were probably pretty even in spring and fall camp
and Crist is the senior coming back from injry
but prob kind of favored Reese in the back of his mind after he went 4-0 dfown the stretch last year
just guessing cause he went to him QUICK
man Kelly was going ape...he had serious roid rage
I was surprised #7 got back on the field...that was a reaming unlike any I've ever seen
every Punt I was just like oh crap oh crap oh crap
and he had at least 2 drops maybe even 3
but all in all I am actually kind of optimistic
they just made stupid play after stupid play, which I think it somewhat a fluke
yup -- you guys totally shot yourselves in the foot -- repeatedly
I did want them to win so bad though for this weekend...just to get the hype built up even more...but will still be a very good game
I like the PSU unis better
I have no idea if PSU will make a game of it or not

As for the way his offense struggled early in the game, Marrone said much of that was because of pregame preparations. Syracuse was anticipating more of a zone look, but that was not what the Orange saw.
i would hope a difference in scheme would make us suck that bad
and that is just Marrone protecting his players
the ratio of players rocking Douglas flap pads is off the chart this year
so will we be able to watch the Cuse through your computer on Willy's TV?
it is on SNY I think
and I think a lot of times MASN gets it is SNY gets it
but yeah worse case we can hook my computer up to the TV
I asked Willy if he gets SNY -- he said no
so we didn't get to chat much about it last week
but after Bailey's first game, what did you think of him as the workhorse?
knowing it is still really early obvs
he reminds me a bit of sproles
runs very hard between the tackles
yeah--was surprised with how he was able to push the pile at times
came away not worried about that at all
doesn't look like its on MASN at this point
so Cliff Lee is pretty damn good
I thought Will used to have two TVs at his place in DC
didn't they have a TV their bedroom too?
now you'll have to answer peoples twitter messages with self-righteous zeal
if one of us asks you a question this weekend about the Hawks...you have to come back at it with a PK response
I didn't think of this but it is pretty interesting:

I don't think I need to say much about Van Chew. Those catches were ridiculous. I still don't think that he had possession on the last catch in the endzone, but as someone said on Twitter last night, thank god for ESPN3 because there was no good angle to overturn the call.
I don't have any clue if he caught it or not
but there was a ref right there
as soon as they called it a TD, you knew it was ballgame
because there was NO way I could see them having a definitive shot
at first I though the ball was just thrown away
cause I couldn't see him at all
I wish Joey's car had wifi, so we could watch the game again on the ride down
and since Bunting was a moron for most of the game I just figured he was an idio
I guess we could watch it through our phones, huh?
you are bringing an ipad right?
but our iPad's are both wireless
mine is 3G...but I don't pay for the service
so what are we doing Sunday--what are your thoughts?
we can watch on our iPads through the Sunday Ticket app at his house...I'm fine watching the Eagles with headphones that way...same for Hawks
Jets and Skins are no worries
Willy's home games should include Ravens Steelers too
yeah I am up for either
part of me wants to go to a bar
part of me is fine with laptop and headphones
all depends on the quality of the bar/table we get I figure
Syracuse game is part of the Gameplan package -- though that probably means non-HD, which is BS
we should record some games to watch after the ND game
another thought is watching the SU game after the ND game
there really aren't that many great games
Mizzou at ASU Friday night I am looking forward to
and yes...there are some nice ones
we could then watch PSU, then ND, then Cuse
that Friday game will be great I think
I kind of think Wisonsin is going to win the NC
I kept meaning to tell you they were going to be my dark horse team, once they got Wilson
Oregon State vs Wisconsin on Saturday
that could be an interesting game
although Oregon State lost to Sacramento State
I'd be interested in the Cincy at Tenn game
is Fresno any good this year?
thought the Chester Taylor signing for the Cards was a decent one
how about Brandon Meriweather getting cut
I was shocked by that -- don't follow the Pats very closely...but that was interesting I thought
yeah - I had read earlier this preseason that they were no happy with him for whatever reason
I finally went to an orthopedist about my right ankle, yeah...turns out had a small fracture in it
the doc was like "it's not a big deal...a severe sprain is a small fracture'
going to do some rehab just to regain strength
he said I have some weakness in the joint
i just started laughing when he told me that though
he was like what's so funny, I'm like if you saw how this happened, you'd be laughing too
I've been running on it with no real issue, so it is fine
figure take care of it now rather than do nothing, sprain again and feel like a dumbass
I need to glue my shoes back together before this weekend
I was going to ask you if you got them fixed
I checked someout but they are either ugly are extremely expensive
i thought there were some cool ones when I was in a golf store a few weeks back
yeah that's the one decent pair I found
damn--golf shoes for $250? that is crazy talk
prob like those the best so far
prob give the super glue a try and then hit up an outlet store or something whenever I see one
I say don't glue the shoes
I used to play without shoes all time time in high school
cause that's what you should do
those $55 shoes only come in size 9
I would have just bought them
drank a bunch of Harp this weekend
I usually get Harp on tap at this Irish bar near work
but this was the first time I had in bottles
he said that he will get 2 regional games at 1pm on Sunday
he thinks the Eagles will be the regional
you have to enter the location
you can't just show the entire eastern
i did it through tv guide
would you trade Hakeem Nicks for Mike Wallace?
how many points did each score last year
Nicks was hurt for several games
but Wallace played x amount of games without Rapelisberger
I still think I would go Wallace
I think Ben is going to have a BIG year
I think he has his shit straight for the first time since his first couple years
what about Ahmad Bradshaw for Peyton Hillis?
plus NY Oline has injury galore
Hillis had a monster year last year
I think Hillis may drop in some points
basically all new starters on their oline
and Cleveland pass game shoudl be improved
with Hilis probably getting more redzone carries
so if total yards are down - TDs may be up
and Joe Thomas is an absolute stud
any further word on Chandler? Besides the "out until further notice?"
would you trade Nicks for Maclin? As much as I love Maclin, that worries me...the Eagles have so many weapons in the O, and just don't know how healthy he is
would need to see a couple of games first
I would probably stay with Nicks
as much I hate having him on my team
what about Dez for Maclin? think no to that too, right?
here's the background to all this
the Hobday family is doing a fantasy league
and in order to make it "fair"
of course I end up with Dez, Nicks, Bradshaw, Felix
I think Dez is going to kill it this year
Cowboys look poised for a huge year offensively if their Oline does anything
supposedly Felix has had an awesome preseason
I will believe it when I see it
I had him like the last 3 years in fantasy as my sleeper back
here's another one: I get Maclin and Stevie Johnson for Nicks
they are all about the same
so are two guys that might be a tiny bit less than nicks worth more than one player that is probably a little better?
is Nicks, Bryant, Boldin, Steve Smith (Car)
only 8 team league so it is all-star city
Brees, AD, Bradshaw, Felix, Gronkowski/Clark are other starters
Nicks has the most potential out of nicks, maclin, johnson
you don't need two above average WRs
you won't be playing both every week I don't think
therefore I would keep the one that might produce slighly better than any 1 of maclin and johnson
if you were real weak and would be starting both I would think it was a good eal
that's my thought too...unless it gave me a better RB...but the Bradshaw for Hillis is a toss up in my mind...maybe slightly headed toward Hillis
but would you then give up Nicks to get him?
I'd rather have Nicks and Bradshaw than Hillis/Maclin/Johnson
how awesome will it be to watch football all weekend and sipping on brews?
it is going to be great
did you make the baseball playoffs?
who is close to you? anyone?
Looks like Danny Watkins will be on the bench for game 1
ive been talking trash on his video game skillz
I need to send you the transcript of this email back and foth
he was dogging on my QB play, which I agreed with him that I am not great, then I looked at his stats and he was AWFUL
is this in your NCAA league?
would be fun to get some games in this weekend, but you know Joey and his ability to get a controller from his brother(s)...harder than finding Bin Laden
you got to start way at the bottom
oh man...you are tempting the beast now
who knew that brother's could be such dicks as not let you borrow a controller for a measly weekend
and all joey has done for them
so how you feeling about Sunday?
honestly wouldn't surprise me if we ended up with the first pick in the draft
wouldn't surprise me if we went 8-8
if they come together and give Tarvaris time and the running backs time I think we can be decent because our defense I think will be good enough as long as they aren't on the field all game
I think Tarvaris can be good enough with the weapons around him and the division we are in to orchestrate a decent offense
again with 8 wins as the barometer
tarvaris isn't good enough to overcome that and our defense isn't good enough to succeed being on the field all game
will probably be a game-to-game thing
I think the 49ers are garbage too
so we may have a chance
i picked the Hawks to cover
so here is my thinking on the Rams
offensively, I don't see any WR who should be able to challenge us vertically
so we should be able to put 8 in the box on most running downs and still be in solid shape
yeah don't think they will kill you vertically
but if you put 8 in the box I think they can pass on you
we should be able to force them into long drives
and if you don't put 8 in the box i think they can run on yo
and then it will be getting off the field on 3rd down
but that feeds their gameplan I'm sure to control the clock
two big holes I see for the ealges are oline and run defense
Vick can possibly cover up for oline
I'm more worried about the oline than the run d
and secondary can possibly cover up for run defense
our run D has never been sup special
yeah I think it is downgraded this year
with Dixon healthy and Patterson healthy again, I think we will be OK there...they need to keep some guys off Matthews et all
I like Chaney -- I think he can play
going the other way, I don't know if the Rams can stop us
but I just think the eagles are crazy good at some positions and then weak at others
or does that lack of balance kill you
offensively, I think we are pretty balanced if the OL is as good as last year
i think people forget that we started a new center and RG last year
but good enough to put up huge numbers/yards/points
with Watkins going to the bench for now
only 1 starter with no NFL experience
so I don't think it is a strength by any stretch of the imagination
but I don't think it will be a debacle either
I do think we will be using Celek a lot as a blocker again this year
you have a higher opinion of your oline than I do
well then your opinion must be really low
but again Vick can cover up
yeah, I'd say right now I'm a little below average--hoping for OK
its too bad you don't have a better Oline now the he is a way more comfortable pocket passer
in ATL they had really good oline
and he would bail ala nassib
even when he 'settled' in the pocket, he was gyrating the ball like he was on fire
that missed TD to Chew early in the game was a perfect example
actually tried to throw while bouncing a few times
he did settle down in the fourth quarter
they should move the pocket I think -- he plays well on the move
they used to do that all the time with McNabb in 2004
worked well to improve his accuracy I thought
weather for Saturday is looking good
man, I hope Chandler is OK
if he had a major knee injury...no way he finishes the game, right?
you know the Rams only beat 1 team with a winning record last year?
yeah, they weren't great last year
sam bradford also had a weak avg per
just after watching him last year I think he is going to be a top level QB
I think he's going to be good
was just surprised to read that is all
I don't think Tampa beat a team with a winning record either
the Eagles have been getting so much hype
now the hype is starting to move against them
like people picking other teams to win division
just funny how it all moves back-and-forth
I thought the Eagles got a lot of hype as soon as they signed all those guys
but then as soon as playoff picks came in I haven't seen anyone really pick them for super bowl
I hate the first few games of the NFL
if the Eagles win or lose they will be the biggest bust or superbowl lock of all time
we overreact so bad to the NFL
that is probably the only downfall to playing once a week
I haven't seen anyone picking them for the SB
and with only one game to go off of the media puts so much meaning into that first, second, 3rd game
lots of losing in the NFC Champ game
would you trade Nnamdi for 2 good offensive lineman and a solid positional starter somewhere else?
basically trade off signing him if it guaranteed solidifying your oline
and maybe a starting safetey or LBer
one thought I had when they signed hanson
was maybe someone is offering a starting olineman for asante
but that was the first thing I thought of
at this point, i'd be shocked if that happened
I think your scenerio is spot on
But I just wonder if that is in the cards
so I know we aren't big Peters fans
I think he is ultra talented
but him and Herramens are an above-average (on the cusp of Pro Bowl) LT and LG
remember though - your RT is really your LT
if Justice comes back healthy and is adequate NFL RT
that restores a very good LT side
Shady averaged liked 5.5 yds a carry to the left last year
also...Vick rolls much better to his left
so Justice is supposedly going to be ready around Game 3 or 4
I don't know the answer to thi
that could help the OLine a lot
but how would you rate him among the elite LTs in this game?
started for Colts, cut this year
colts oline sucked last year right?
started for them their SB year against the Saints
I am sure the eagles oline will be fine
I am only critisizing on a superbowl level
when I talk about the seahawks
I talk on a different level
did Michael Robinson make the team?
he looked bad the first couple games
lot of people riding the Falcons train this year
thought this prediction by Don Banks was interesting:

2. After playing in the relative obscurity of Oakland for the first eight years of his NFL career (all playoff-less and non-winning years), Eagles cornerback Nnamdi Asomugha will have some unexpected struggles in the big-game, big-market atmosphere of the NFC East. He won't be left unchallenged for seasons at a time in his new division, and the more teams try to throw at him, the more he'll appear less than invincible and even a little vulnerable. By season's end, some will consider him over-rated.
Read more: http://sportsillustrated.cnn.com/2011/writers/don_banks/09/06/bold.predictions/index.html#ixzz1XIa0sDVE
I see a couple of flaws in that logic
1. Of course teams are going to throw more at him -- he's playing opposite of an all-Pro as well
2. If all goes well for the Eagles, they will be scoring a lot of points, forcing other teams to throw, thus more chances at him
